attributes.action: To help close the group soldiers off the street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have found a group on facebook that fully disgraces our soldiers, verbally accusing them of being rapists child murders and so on, saying that they should be kept under lock and key, our soldiers are brave people that deserve the upmost respect, not to be verbally abused like this they have a hard enough job with out thinking the people at home dont care and respect them as they should be. we have approched facebook independintly and they have fail to do anything even tho they receive endless amounts of complaints about the group

rejection.details: We suggest you contact Facebook to report suspected abuse of their site. Should you feel that the accusations amount to a criminal act, we suggest you contact the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
